Ok Cheri
  and Thanks
   
  Rees

Cheri Esperon <cesperon@...> wrote:
            Sorry.... I hate when they end up being nothing :o(  He is really good at identifying languages, even though he is a "non-believer"  he does help me out from time to time.  So if you ever had another odd one- he said send it over..   
   
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Wiliam Clarke 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, April 25, 2008 8:45 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Does anybody speak spanish?
  

    Ok well thank u!  I guess that solves that.

Cheri Esperon <cesperon@...> wrote:         My Dh is fluent in Spanish & speaks several other languages.. I had him listen and he said it sounds like the 2nd half of an English word..
   
   
    ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Wiliam Clarke 
  To: Posted Messages ; rtsc Posred messages 
  Sent: Friday, April 25, 2008 8:24 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Does anybody speak spanish?
  

      My file helpmefindhim, I can't understand what is said after my question.  Does anybody speak Spanish in these forums?  Please let me know what it means, if it means anything.
   
  Thanks
   
  W. Rees
